item.title: The Art of Slack & Relax in Office
item.description: First published at here Why choose to learn at office I work at a desk job, and I can somehow relate to your feeling. I adopt a slack-and-relax approach when learning code at office. This job pays little, and I am just an unimportant small potato rotting in the cubicle. Instead of wasting my time here, why not try to make a better use of it? Slack-and-relax approach My practice of discrete learning / slacking has been gradually changing since the first day of my work.
